text: atkhdh alyhwd walnsara alelma' waleubbad arbabana yusharriewn lahum alahkam, fyltzmwn biha wytrkwn shraye allh, watakhadhuu almasih eisaa abn maryam 'ilhana febdwh, waqad 'amrihim allah bebadth wahdah dun ghyrh, fahu al'ilh alhaqu la 'ilh 'iilaa hw. tnzzah wtqddas eamaa yftryh 'ahl alshirk waldlal
